thread.section_title: VORTEX SPAS NEW ZEALAND LIMITED Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of VORTEX SPAS NEW ZEALAND LIMITED | vortexspas.co.nz
thread.title: Jenny Gliddon
thread.title_full: VORTEX SPAS NEW ZEALAND LIMITED reviewed by Jenny Gliddon

author: Jenny Gliddon
title: Jenny Gliddon
text:
We highly recommend the Mercury Vortex Spa. Thank you to Neisha who was extremely helpful, professional and easy to deal with in helping us to select the spa which best suited our family and the installation and follow up was 100 per cent from all involved. We love the spa I feel like I'm on holiday in a resort (not our backyard) with amazing jets that help ease sore neck & back muscles after a day at work or tramping; lights and bubbles which give a beautiful ambiance and what is great is it is easy maintained
Jenny & Peter Gliddon
